publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3616 Donald Gorrie: Delays in Security Clearance for Parliamentary Staff-That the Parliament is dissatisfied with the long delays frequently occurring in the process of obtaining security clearance for new staff and the lack of accountability of the government department involved in the process and urges the Presiding Officer to take up the matter with the relevant authorities.

S1M-3616 Donald Gorrie: Delays in Security Clearance for Parliamentary Staffâ€”That the Parliament is dissatisfied with the long delays frequently occurring in the process of obtaining security clearance for new staff and the lack of accountability of the government department involved in the process and urges the Presiding Officer to take up the matter with the relevant authorities.
S1M-3616 Delays in Security Clearance for Parliamentary Staff (lodged on 21 November 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*, Brian Adam*
S1M-3616 Delays in Security Clearance for Parliamentary Staff (lodged on 21 November 2002) Ms Sandra White*
